segments.text: This kitchen's turning into a slippery hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink faucet's blasting water, basin overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's drying a plate, but she's stepping in the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No reaction from her; she's completely zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's climbing the stool to the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tipping backward; he could tumble down hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand in the cookie jar, the other with a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's reaching up, eyes on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the cabinets; what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's calm, mocking the indoor panic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one slips or falls in this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears real quick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone turn off that faucet already.
segments.speaker: PAR
